strings.Value: [Attack] "You shouldn't have crossed me."
"Forgive me. It was an accident."
[Give the bully 500 gold] "Here. For the damage."
"Best not anger me. I've put away more people and monsters than you have bottles over the course of your waste of a life. Get out of here while you still can."
[Knock the bully out with a stealthy blow]
"Why, is that Annamede Belavarah herself over there? And it looks like she's calling you!"
"How did you do it?"
"Hey! I could've handled him myself!"
"Thank you, Tristian."
[Kiss Tristian on the cheek] "My protector!"

{n}A young man staggers toward you, his expensive doublet wet with wine. As he passes, he brushes shoulders with you and starts yelling, his breath rank with alcohol.{/n} "Watch yourself! Who do you think you are, you pig?! You tramped on my foot and ruined my doublet, hic! I'm gonna... I demand satisfaction!"
"Uh... Help! Murderrr!"
"What? Forgive you? Hic! You bump me, ruin my doublet, and I'm supposed to just forgive you? Who's gonna clean this, huh? It's expensive! And you slopped wine all over it!"
"Well, then, all right. Fine! You got off easy, though!" {n}The young man takes the money and leaves.{/n}
"I... Uh... Sorry, sorry. Think I — hic! — confused you for someone else... Sorry. My mistake. These things happen..." {n}Mumbling apologies, the bully disappears.{/n}
"Wait, you're threatening me? Ha ha! I'm... I'll... Single-handed, too! Come on, then, draw your weapon! I... I d-demand satisf- hic!"

{n}No one notices as you drive a swift blow to the bully's solar plexus. It simply seems as though he swayed and leaned on you, after which you graciously helped him step away to lie down in the shade.{/n}
{n}After a swift blow to the solar plexus, the drunkard falls to the ground — but you immediately hear someone scream from behind you, calling for the guards.{/n}
"What? Really? Where? Oh... how do I look? Quickly, now! I'm all right? Phew, good. Annamede, my joy! I'll be right there!"
"Don't you smooth talk me, hic! I... You ruined my doublet! You jerk!"

{n}Tristian clears his throat, attracting the drunkard's attention.{/n} "You've made a mistake. Move along." {n}You barely see the face of the priest behind the edge of his hood, but you glimpse that the corners of his mouth have tensed up.{/n}

"Wha-a-at? Who the hell are..." {n}The drunkard focuses his eyes on the priest's face, and then seems to sober up considerably.{/n} "Oh... S-Sorry... My mistake..." {n}Turning around, he stumbles away quite quickly.{/n}
{n}Tristian gives you a smile.{/n} "It's just a trifle compared to what you've done for me."
{n}Tristian puts his arm around your waist.{/n} "I'm trying to be. I won't let anything bad happen to you at the festival."

{n}Tristian pretends to be very serious.{/n} "Don't you know? I have very expressive eyes." {n}The priest squints his blind eyes and turns the corner of his mouth in a smirk.{/n} "Seriously, {name}, I'm still a deva. I know how to make a point when I have to."
{n}Tristian lowers his head.{/n} "No doubt. I just didn't want to see you get your hands dirty on this drunkard."
